## Contents of this starter code repo

* hw3_notebook.ipynb
* viz_tools_for_binary_classifier.py [DO NOT EDIT]

### Files for Problem 4 (implementing predict for MLP)

* neural_networks.py
* activations.py [DO NOT EDIT]
